item.title: Hotwire - Turbo
item.description: Table of Contents Hotwrite / Turbo Drive Progressbar Asset Tracking Manually trigger a full page reload Redirects after form submission Caching Navigation Events Persisting Elements across page loads Frames Lazy Loading In / Out of frame Hotwrite / Turbo Migraton: https://dev.to/coorasse/from-turbolinks-to-turbo-31jl Drive A page navigation is seen as a visit which is connected to an ’action’. An action can either be [:advance, :replace, :restoration].
